params.asset_: Underlying asset token accepted by the vault.

params.assets: Assets to transfer into the vault.

returns.shares: Shares to burn using ceil rounding.

recordCashflowPayment(address,uint256).details: We intentionally avoid `deposit(...)` here because deposit mints new shares and would dilute existing investors.      The business intent is that creator payments increase vault assets per share (PPS), so this function only transfers assets.

params.assets: Amount of assets paid into the vault.

returns._0: Current MockUSDC balance owned by this vault.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Sets an allowance for vault share transfers.

constructor.notice: Creates a new vault bound to one USDC asset token and one schedule contract.

convertToAssets(uint256).notice: Converts shares to assets using ERC-4626 floor-rounding semantics.

convertToShares(uint256).notice: Converts assets to shares using ERC-4626 floor-rounding semantics.

deposit(uint256,address).notice: Deposits assets and mints shares to the receiver.

mint(uint256,address).notice: Mints exact shares to a receiver by pulling required assets.

previewDeposit(uint256).notice: Estimates shares minted for a deposit.

previewMint(uint256).notice: Estimates required assets to mint an exact amount of shares.

previewRedeem(uint256).notice: Estimates assets returned by redeeming shares.

previewWithdraw(uint256).notice: Estimates required shares to withdraw exact assets.

recordCashflowPayment(address,uint256).notice: Records a creator cashflow payment without minting shares.

redeem(uint256,address,address).notice: Redeems exact shares for underlying assets.

setSchedule(address).notice: Sets the cashflow schedule allowed to record payments.

totalAssets().notice: Returns the amount of underlying assets held by the vault.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfers shares from caller to receiver.

withdraw(uint256,address,address).notice: Withdraws exact assets to receiver by burning owner shares.
